sections.heading: Facility, defined.Facility shall mean the land, building, and equipment selected pursuant to the Central Interstate Low-Level Radioactive Waste Compact and used or to be used for the disposal of low-level radioactive waste
sections.text: SourceLaws 1986, LB 491, ยง 13;Laws 1987, LB 426, ยง 7;Laws 1989, LB 761, ยง 4.C
